column5: I've seen lots of reports from lake simcoe in the last couple of weeks, some from the Innisfil area even.  What I haven't seen is anyone mention how thick the ice is...can anyone tell me?  I'll be on vacation next week and will likely take a run down for a look see, but would still like to know.  Also can you tell me if there's a lot of snow covering the ice?  Thanks Maureen
i was there a week ago and  i drilled throught 8 inchs but lots of snow up there since then.Bigchev should be able to help out his hut is out there.
